platform.name: EcoRubber
platform.description: Comprehensive platform for sustainable rubber farming that supports livelihoods and promotes eco-friendly industries through advanced farming practices.

hero.description: Explore how rubber tree plantations support livelihoods and promote eco-friendly industries through sustainable farming practices.

features.title: Sustainability in Farming
features.description: Advanced eco-friendly farming techniques that preserve biodiversity while maximizing yield.

features.title: Eco-Friendly Products
features.description: Natural rubber products that reduce environmental impact across multiple industries.

features.title: Community Impact
features.description: Supporting local communities through fair trade practices and sustainable employment.

features.title: Global Reach
features.description: Connecting sustainable rubber farming with international markets and standards.

testimonials.quote: EcoRubber has revolutionized our approach to sustainable sourcing. The quality and environmental impact are outstanding.
testimonials.author: Maria Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Sustainability Director
